data.title: Consulting & Engineering Support
data.short: We provide expert consulting and engineering services, including compliance, testing, and certification support.

description.title:
Our Approach
and Capabilities
description.content: We offer comprehensive consulting and engineering support for UAVs, UGVs, robotics, and autonomous systems. Our services include system design reviews, integration support, performance validation, compliance audits, testing, and assistance with DGCA approvals, Type certifications, and other regulatory requirements. We ensure that your systems meet industry standards while achieving operational efficiency and reliability.

items.label: Technical Consulting
items.value:
We provide expert guidance on system architecture, design, and integration for UAVs, UGVs, and autonomous platforms.

Our team helps optimize performance, safety, and reliability across complex projects.

items.label: Testing & Validation
items.value:
We conduct functional testing, performance validation, and compliance testing for hardware, firmware, and AI systems.

Our approach ensures your platforms meet operational and safety standards.

items.label: Regulatory Compliance
items.value:
We assist with DGCA approvals, Type certifications, and other regulatory requirements for UAVs and autonomous systems.

Our team ensures systems adhere to applicable laws and industry standards for safe operations.

items.label: Project Support & Advisory
items.value:
We provide end-to-end project support, including feasibility analysis, risk assessment, and engineering advisory services.

Our expertise helps clients execute complex projects efficiently and safely.

related.title: Complex Mechanical and Aerospace Structure Design
related.short: We design and engineer advanced aerospace platforms and mechanical systems for UAVs, VTOLs, and helicopters.

description.title:
Our Approach
and Capabilities
description.content: We specialize in engineering complex mechanical and aerospace structures for fixed-wing aircraft, multicopters, hybrid VTOLs, helicopters, and other autonomous platforms. Our expertise covers electric and fuel combustion propulsion systems, structural design, aerodynamics, and full systems integration, delivering high-performance and reliable technologies.

items.label: Structural Design
items.value:
We develop robust mechanical structures for UAVs, VTOLs, and helicopters optimized for strength, weight, and stability.

Our designs are suitable for both electric and fuel-based propulsion systems and tailored to specific mission requirements.

items.label: Aerodynamic Optimization
items.value:
We analyze lift, drag, and stability characteristics for fixed-wing, multicopter, and hybrid VTOL platforms.

Simulations ensure efficiency, endurance, and safe operation in real-world conditions.

items.label: Propulsion & Systems Integration
items.value:
We integrate electric motors, combustion engines, and hybrid propulsion with avionics and control systems.

This ensures seamless interaction between mechanical, electrical, and software components for reliable performance.

items.label: Prototyping & Testing
items.value:
We build and test prototypes to validate structural integrity, aerodynamics, and system functionality.

Iterative testing ensures performance, safety, and compliance with industry standards.

related.title: Advanced Hardware & Firmware Development
related.short: We develop hardware and firmware solutions for robotics, UAVs, UGVs, and autonomous systems.

description.title:
Our Approach
and Capabilities
description.content: We specialize in engineering hardware and firmware solutions for robotics, UAVs, and autonomous systems. Our expertise spans custom flight controllers, avionics, radio controllers, telemetry systems, battery management systems, power distribution units, ESCs, ROS, PX4, ArduPilot, Betaflight, LiDARs, radars, 4D radars, custom device drivers for microcontrollers and Linux, as well as GCS software development and customization for QGC and Mission Planner. We deliver fully integrated, reliable, and high-performance systems tailored to industry needs.

items.label: Embedded Firmware Development
items.value:
We develop low-level firmware for microcontrollers and embedded systems in robotics and UAVs.

Our work includes custom drivers, real-time control, sensor integration, and Linux device driver development.

items.label: Autonomy Stacks & Middleware
items.value:
We implement and customize ROS, PX4, ArduPilot, and Betaflight stacks for autonomous vehicles.

Our solutions integrate sensors, actuators, and control algorithms for UAVs, UGVs, and robotic platforms.

items.label: PCBs, Hardware and Sensor
items.value:
We integrate LiDARs, radars, 4D radars, cameras, GPS, IMUs, and other sensors into autonomous systems.

We also design, manufacture and integrate custom PCB designs, power electronics boards, 3D printer mainboards, flight controllers, avionics, radio controllers, telemetry systems, battery management, power distribution, and ESCs for complete hardware solutions.

items.label: GCS Software & Mission Planning
items.value:
We develop and customize ground control station software including QGC and Mission Planner.

This includes mission planning, telemetry, and control software for UAVs, UGVs, and robotic platforms.

related.title: AI & Machine Learning Solutions
related.short: We deliver AI and ML solutions for autonomous systems, computer vision, and advanced robotics.

description.title:
Our Approach
and Capabilities
description.content: We design and develop AI and machine learning solutions for robotics, UAVs, UGVs, and autonomous systems. Our expertise spans computer vision, collision avoidance, GPS-denied navigation, swarm control, path planning, object tracking, sensor fusion, and real-time decision making. We create intelligent systems that enable fully autonomous operations in complex environments for industrial, defense, and research applications.

items.label: Computer Vision & Perception
items.value:
We develop computer vision algorithms for object detection, tracking, mapping, and scene understanding.

Our solutions enable UAVs and robots to perceive and interact with dynamic environments in real time.

items.label: Autonomy & Navigation
items.value:
We implement AI-driven navigation, path planning, GPS-denied operation, and collision avoidance systems.

Our systems ensure reliable autonomous movement in complex or GPS-limited environments.

items.label: Swarm & Multi-Agent Control
items.value:
We develop swarm intelligence algorithms for coordinated control of multiple autonomous vehicles.

This includes formation flying, cooperative missions, and distributed decision making.

items.label: Sensor Fusion & Real-Time AI
items.value:
We integrate LiDAR, radar, cameras, IMUs, and other sensors with AI/ML algorithms for perception and control.

Our solutions provide real-time decision making for safe, intelligent autonomous operations.
